title: How Crisis Can Lead to Renewed Honesty and Purpose
itunes:title: How Crisis Can Lead to Renewed Honesty and Purpose
description:
Anne-Marie Slaughter, CEO at New America, discusses her book "Renewal: From Crisis to Transformation in Our Lives, Work, and Politics."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
